recipesJson.name: Peach Pie
recipesJson.author: rickj
recipesJson.description: Peach Pie & Cream is the star of this recipe, It has a great cooked peach taste  with a hint of pastry. I added a little Sweet Coconut to enhance the mouth feel, and some Pear to give it a little sweetness and juiciness and to support the peach flavor. Lastly just as touch of Apple Filling to give it a hint of cinnamon to the mix. Sweeten to taste
